caption:
We’ve got the all-natural skin routine you’ve been waiting for! 😍

The @bombaybeautyco 4 step Skin Essentials Kit is an all-natural, plant-based daily routine to make your skin feel and look its best. Here’s what comes in each Skin Essentials Kit:

✨ Green Tea & Oats Cleanser
💫 Rosa Facial Toner
🌟 Rosa Facial Serum
⚡️ Almond & Avocado Facial Lotion

We get you! We’ve all switched between products trying to find the right routine that works best. That’s why we encourage you to ask our beauticians to try it yourself next time you visit any one of our locations. 

Our essentials kits are used during many of our services. So that beautiful clean, rose aroma you experience at Bombay Brow can be taken home with you! 

Pick up this kit at your next brow appointment, or click the link in our bio to shop our whole collection!
